about_the_game:
Play the game... SEES GAME!!
Play as Sees in a reimagined take of the classic Snake game.
Eat apples and compete with your friends for the hi-score!

Features:

  • 10 diferent mazes.
  • 3 game modes, 2 of them unlockable after reaching a certain amount of points:
    Normal: Make your way through the randomly selected labyrinths.
    Classic: No walls! One mistake and it's Game Over.
    Time Trial: Keep eatng apples before the time runs out. Can't pause in this mode.
  • Unlockable skins.
  • 8-bit style soundtrack arranged by Marcelo Canario.
  • Easter eggs!

How to play:

Use arrow keys or WASD to move around.

Press Q or P to pause the game (you have a 3 seconds cooldown to pause again).

Press C to switch the camera.

Eating apples makes you faster. Careful though, because you get REALLY fast.

Red Apples give you 1 point. Golden Apples give you 2 points.



Some mazes feature tunnels you can go through. Play seestrategically!

Credits:

Kovaldevlog: Basically all the magic.
Rodricoro: Big loser, no one cares.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to submit leaderboard scores.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to submit leaderboard scores.

  • Processor: Apple M1 - Intel Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to submit leaderboard scores.

name: Sees Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to submit leaderboard scores.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to submit leaderboard scores.

short_description: Play as Sees in a reimagined take of the classic Snake game. Eat apples and compete with your friends for the hi-score!
